m_szDocTitle: Audi May Unveil a Hydrogen Fuel Cell Concept in Detroit | Digital Trends
m_szDocSumamry: Delivered to your inbox for free! The Audi e-tron quattro concept that debuted at this year’s Frankfurt Motor Show is just the tip of the iceberg when it comes to the brand’s interest in electric cars. It previews a production model due in 2018, and Audi believes electric cars will comprise a quarter of its U.S. sales by 2025 . But the German carmaker may be looking to hedge its bets. Audi will debut a hydrogen fuel cell concept car at the 2016 Detroit Auto Show next month, according to Autobild . Possibly called h-tron quattro, the new concept will reportedly use the same body as the e-tron q
